tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EducationalOpportunities (
  opportunity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  opportunity_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  organization_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  location TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Opportunities (
  opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  opportunity_name VARCHAR(255),
  opportunity_type VARCHAR(100),
  provider_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  nationality VARCHAR(100),
  education_level VARCHAR(50),
  opportunity_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (opportunity_id) REFERENCES Opportunities(opportunity_id)
);

CREATE TABLE educational_opportunities (
    opportunity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    organization VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE opportunities (
  opportunity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  opportunity_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  is_active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  participant_age INT,
  contact_email VARCHAR(100),
  registration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Referral (
  referral_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  referral_date TIMESTAMP,
  referral_type VARCHAR(50),
  referral_source VARCHAR(50),
  referral_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Opportunity (
  opportunity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  opportunity_title VARCHAR(100),
  organization_name VARCHAR(100),
  opportunity_description TEXT,
  opportunity_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Participant (
  participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(100),
  participant_gender VARCHAR(10),
  participant_age INT,
  participant_nationality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Enrollment (
  enrollment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id UUID REFERENCES Participant(participant_id),
  opportunity_id UUID REFERENCES Opportunity(opportunity_id),
  enrollment_date TIMESTAMP,
  enrollment_status VARCHAR(20)
);
